text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
“Next is the 1st Halon race. Everyone has been practicing hard. 
If you are a guardian, please give a lot of support”

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
“Amazing-Amazing! The only girl who got out was Biwa 
Hayahide-chan's little-sister, Narita Brian-chan!”

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: “Brian-chan, wins 1st prize～!”

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
“Big-sister was fast too, but Brian-chan was faster! Everyone 
please give a round of applause～!”

text_block_list.name: Guardian A
text_block_list.text:
This girl, I'm sure she will achieve big things 
if she runs in the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Guardian B
text_block_list.text: She might be faster than her Big-sister.

text_block_list.name: Loli Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (Brian…)
Narita Brian, who won the “Japan Derby”ー

Her outstanding ability attracted attention from 
all around the world, and requests for interviews 
keep coming one after another every day.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It seems that the media is pushing even more today. Tazuna wept 
that she would like us to be interviewed soon.

Well, but there are inquiries coming 
at a level that hinders training…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
There's no helping it～, I'll be covering 
this place on behalf of Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I don't mind, as long as I can run.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You know, it's a deal! I'll tell them something about my passion!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please just do what you have to do!

Well, I think the other party will not be convinced even if I 
make a substitute, so let's accept only as much as we can.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll go to training, I'll leave the rest to you.
Oh, you should go outside now. There will be reporters in school.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Ah, I got it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She really is person with a strong passion for running. No matter 
how much she achieves, she doesn't seem to get fulfilled.

It is that the strength of her feelings is connected 
to her real motives. I'm sure that she will go far 
beyond our expectations from now on.

It is that the strength of her feelings is connected 
to her real motives. I'm sure that she will go far 
beyond our expectations from now on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Just where lies the root of the strength of her feelings?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: *Pant*…*Pant*…

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Wait～～! Wait a bit～～!!

text_block_list.name: Girl's Sister
text_block_list.text: Heh… Heh… alrighty, I'm first!!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Heh… mmm～, why didn't you wait～～!!

text_block_list.name: Girl’s Sister
text_block_list.text: Because, it's a race!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What, are you training outside too?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Big-sister…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I see… you were chased by interviewers. You are near achieving 
“The Triple Crown Horse Girl”, so It can't be helped.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…So, do you think you can take the triple 
crown and win the “Kikkashou”?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Who knows, I never thought about it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
There is no such thing as the Triple Crown being insignificant, 
but my goal is not there.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
That's why the “Kikkashou” is not about whether 
I win or not. It is natural to win.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …Geez, that's your answer.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It has been said that your “Talent” is one of it's kind, and it 
has naturally produced results and continues. I have a ridiculous 
little-sister, which I hold high.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Even so, I have not overtaken my sister's back yet.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You have talent, you're amazing, such awards don't matter.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I just want to run in front of my sister 
on the stage called Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…I'm honored if you think so, however, 
that goal won't easily come true.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I know that much, because I've been chasing you all the time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …It's time to get back to training. See ya, Big-sister.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yeah, be careful.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It is hard to have a sister who is talented. How much do I have 
to do, to keep showing you my back…?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…But, a Big-sister has something called a Big-sister's 
pride. Even if you become “Triple Crown Horse Girl” 
I can't lose to my Little-sister.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Goo～～!! Hayahide!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
In the final corner, Biwa Hayahide took the lead! The No. 1 
favorite Biwa Hayahide is currently leading!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Even upon entering the final straight line, 
the dramatization does not fade! She is also 
supporting next, the difference is wide!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Strong-Strong! Biwa Hayahide achieves a landslide 
victory in the “Takarazuka Kinen”!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The same as the Derby of her Little-sister Narita Brian, it was 
settled with a 5 lengths difference of margin! What's more, it's 
a record! It's a record time!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woohoo～!! You're amazing Hayahide!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: *Sobbing*～～!! Hayahide congratulations～～!!
As expected, of your sister!
As expected, of your sister!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …After all, Big-sister is Big-sister.

Narita Brian and Biwa Hayhide enliven the Twinkle 
Series on their respective routes.

If those sisters were to compete directly against 
each other, which one is strongerー It was quite 
natural for the world to think so.
